name: Bruleed Lemon Tart | DEVELOPED
description:
This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: NaChef, Max Savage, Graham, and Folkart.
MaxSavage suggested this profile based on a dessert created by master pastry chefs while he worked in the service industry.  This profile takes a lemon tart and makes it a bit more interesting by caramelizing the top to a golden brown. Full flavor notes on DEVELOPED Episode 37 at https://youtu.be/oZKXD5yRJ1c .

Our weekly episodes are released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST 
Check out our website at https://www.DevelopedDIY.com
Find us on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/c/DevelopedDIY 
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/developeddiy/
Check out our FaceBook Page at https://www.facebook.com/developeddiy/
author: Developed

reviews.text: I mixed this up and let it sit for 2 weeks. Just vaped it this morning and wow is this delicious. The lemon is a nice baked sweet lemon with a little tartness still and is balanced really well with the rest of the mix. I was nervous to mix this up because of the ry4 double but I'm glad I mixed a 30 ml because it works!
Hands down best lemon meringue tart recipe the creme brulee and ry4 really make the recipe stand out among the rest
Really lovely. The RY4 is an interesting idea and I love FE lemon for these kind of lemony tart like deserts. Yummy!

This is hands down the best lemon profile I’ve vaped in a long long time! It’s layered perfectly and utterly delicious! I did sub TPA RY4 for DFS Holy Grail but it was epic. Well done lads,great work right here. 5 stars ⭐️
This is an exquisite recipe. I added 2 drops of VT Sour Lemon per 10ml for that extra touch of tart zing and sweetness instead of the super sweet and it was just right for me. Great work.
